Address.label: Address
Address.value: 200 CLARENDON STREET,JOHN HANCOCK TOWER, BOSTON, Massachusetts, 02116-5092, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: CRA International Inc is a U.S.-based advisory firm that provides economic, financial, and management consultancy services. The company advises clients on economic and financial issues relating to litigation and regulatory proceedings and helps businesses set important business strategies and solve performance-related issues. The company's clients include domestic and foreign companies, government agencies, public and private utilities, and national and international trade associations. CRA International generates almost all its revenue from the United States and the United Kingdom.
